name: cart-icon
description: Cart is used for viewing all the items added to the cart, allows user to proceed to checkout.

imageSettings.description: Image settings for cart line item

enableHoverCart.description: Show mini cart on mouse over on cart icon.

cartLinesSortOrder.description: This property will show you to change the order in which items appear in the mini-cart

enum.ascending: New items added to bottom of list
enum.descending: New items added to top of list

isAnonymousCheckout.description: When this property is enabled, mini-cart will allow anonymous checkout if user is not signed-in

clientRender.description: Enabling this property will cause the module to load its Javascript chunk and render on the client based on the user view port. This property is recommended for modules which are generally hidden below the users view port (lower on the page) to increase page load performance.

goToCartButtonTitle.comment: Label for go to cart button. Count = number of items in the cart

totalPriceFormatString.comment: String associated with total price to display. Price = formatted price

productDimensionTypeColor.comment: String that corresponds to the Color Product Dimension Type (1)

productDimensionTypeSize.comment: String that corresponds to the Size Product Dimension Type (3)

productDimensionTypeStyle.comment: String that corresponds to the Style Product Dimension Type (4)

productDimensionTypeConfiguration.comment: String that corresponds to the Style Product Dimension Configuration (2)

quantityDisplayText.comment: String that corresponds to the quantity display text

cartLabel.comment: string to be shown for cart or shopping bag tooltip

cartQtyLabel.comment: string to be shown for cart item quantity

flyoutTitle.comment: string to be shown for mini cart flyout

shippingText.comment: string to be shown for Shipping label

checkoutBlockedDueToUnavailableFundsTitl.comment: Title of message to be shown when an employee working on behalf of customer is warned that the current cart cannot be checked out.

checkoutBlockedDueToUnavailableFundsMess.comment: Text of message to be shown when an employee working on behalf of customer is warned that the current cart cannot be checked out.
checkoutBlockedDueToUnavailableFundsMess.value: To enable checkout, work with the Business partner to ensure funds have been allocated to this account.
